Fun and healthy Market and cafe in the heart of Barcelona.  We stopped in here on a whim while headed back to our Hotel after a day of sightseeing. We had 2 woks, one with veggies and one with chicken. Both were very good.  If you are veggie or vegan I would ask exactly what is in each wok dish.  The place also has a nice health food store built in.  I would recommend this for a healthy meal in Barcelona.
